notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: example of misuse of countable and uncountable nouns
certain nouns can be countable or uncountable:
time is one example
man is another example
famous quote by Armstrong (1969) had countable/uncountable problem:
said "One small step for a man,…"
heard "One small step for man,…"

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
